snippet.title: The Sun Shines Over Us - Official Trailer for PC and Console
snippet.description:
An award-winning visual novel that tells the recovery journey of Indonesian high school students. While focusing on the story of a victim of bullying, The Sun Shines Over Us also represents other mental and relationship issues between teens.

OST by Moccatune - Kisah Ini
